Tucson keeps his engine running at full tilt, and now barrels through the t=
unnels to attempt a quick getaway, as he now heads in the direction of the =
ark.  As he does so he sends word to Lord Elder.

"This is Tucson Prime to =
Lord Elder, Over!  Erect the defense shields and keep a window open for my =
arrival!  We have Rodimus Prime, I repeat we have Rodimus Prime!  We need a=
ll medics front and center! I don't know how much time we have to save Rodi=
mus, and we're dealing with unknown life forms down here.  Expect us within=
 an eight hour time span.  This is Tucson Prime signing out."

At the Ark, =
Night Shift also hears the message.

"Sweet, the big guy did it, he got eve=
ryone tagether for a group effort.  They're commn' back."

Rat Trap sits on=
 the edge of his seat hoping for his big buddy to return safely.

"C'mon Wh=
eels, C'mon, you can do this, I know you can do this..."

In the tunnels, Q=
uick Stride and Straight Shot try to take off the strands of silk from arou=
nd Rodimus's body, and find it to be super sticky.

Straight Shot tries sha=
king it off her hands with very little luck.

" Talk about being "stuck" in=
 between a rock and a hard place. It's worse than astro sludge!"

Quick Str=
ide too, has a hard time getting it off his fingers.

" Ughhh, you said tha=
t right Straight Shot. This goop doesn't wanna come off! Legacy, can ya hel=
p us out?  Can't get this stuff off of Rodimus, it's just too slaggn' stick=
y."
